name: Out Of CTRL (KnightOrc)
description:
This game was developed as an entry for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. The theme for the jam was "Out Of Control".

The game is a play on the words of the theme. The idea is to find and eliminate the letters C, T, R, L (in that order!) from the board so that the board is "out of CTRL". Each level requires a certain number of CTRL's to be found within a set time.

Game Controls:

Mouse to move cursor. Left click to select tile. Easy!

Credits:

I (reallyqbert A.K.A. KnightOrc) coded the entire game in Godot.

The art, sound fx and music are from the wonderful Kenny Game Asset bundle.
